lines.name: Cortex

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Experience gain
Monster Level: 83
Map has (3-5) additional random Modifiers
Map has (2-4) additional Synthesis Global Modifiers

lines.flavourText: Though my life is gone, my purpose is not.\nMy will remains, emboldened and empowered\nby the righteousness of my cause.

lines.name: Doryani's Machinarium

explicitModifiers.text: (20-50)% increased Experience gain
Found Items have a 10% chance to drop Corrupted in Area
Unique Boss is augmented by Player choices

lines.flavourText: We are ever the makers of our own undoing.

lines.name: The Perandus Manor

explicitModifiers.text: (100-150)% increased Experience gain
(200-300)% more Rare Monsters
(30-40)% more Monster Life
(16-24)% increased Monster Damage
Area contains Cadiro Perandus

lines.flavourText: Forget kings and emperors;\nHe who holds the coin holds all the power.

lines.name: The Coward's Trial

explicitModifiers.text: Contains waves of Monsters
Contains additional waves of Undead Monsters
Area contains additional waves of Ghosts
Area contains additional waves of Oriathan Zombies
Area contains additional waves of Phantasms
Area contains additional waves of Raging Spirits
Area contains additional waves of Bone Rhoas
Area contains additional waves of Ravager Maws
Area contains additional waves of Zombies

lines.flavourText:
For his sins he was hunted in his sleep,
judgement wrought of twisted nightmare.
The Coward bound his dreams to stone, awaiting
another to walk the path of true atonement.

lines.name: The Beachhead

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Experience gain
Monster Level: 80
Map has (3-5) additional random Modifiers
Map has (2-4) additional Synthesis Global Modifiers

lines.flavourText: The winters of my youth were cold and harsh.\nWe had nothing, yet to my mother's credit, I wanted for so little.

lines.flavourText: Without our strict rule, man's destructive side would take hold.\nOur beautiful public spaces, our services for the ill and the needy,\nall of it would crumble.

lines.name: The Vinktar Square

explicitModifiers.text: 20% more Monster Life
Monsters cannot be Shocked
20% increased Monster Damage
+35% Monster Lightning Resistance
Monsters deal 35% extra Damage as Lightning

lines.flavourText:
To the east, 
it cannot be seen.
To the west, 
it cannot be touched.
To the south, 
it cannot be remembered.
And to the north, 
it cannot be contained.

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Experience gain
Monster Level: 80
Map has (3-5) additional random Modifiers
Map has (2-4) additional Synthesis Global Modifiers

lines.flavourText: It was in my oath that I found peace.\nIn echoing marble halls I found my voice.\nBefore the congregation I found purpose.

explicitModifiers.text: 150% increased Experience gain
(140-160)% more Monster Life
(140-160)% increased Monster Damage

lines.flavourText:
Laughs of all the twisted
Echo through these halls of gold.
In this cold forgotten void
They wander, forever uncontrolled.

lines.name: Augmented Distant Memory

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Experience gain
Monster Level: 80
Map has (3-5) additional random Modifiers
Map has (2-4) additional Synthesis Global Modifiers

lines.flavourText: What had seemed sacred and infallible\nso quickly became flawed out of necessity.\nCreated from compromises. Vulnerable to mortal whims.

lines.name: Hall of Grandmasters

explicitModifiers.text: Contains the Immortalised Grandmasters\nPvP damage scaling in effect

lines.flavourText:
The grandest and greatest ever to fight,
Divine the champions stand tall.
But match their power, best their might,
And even the immortal may fall.

lines.name: Vaults of Atziri

explicitModifiers.text: Chests have (2533-3493)% increased Item Rarity
Area contains no monsters
Found Items have a (20-40)% chance to drop Corrupted in Area

lines.flavourText: Should I depart this mortal coil,\nso shall all of my treasures.\n- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Hallowed Ground

explicitModifiers.text: Unique Boss drops 3 additional Maps
Unique Boss gives 2000% increased Experience
0.5 Flask Charges recovered every 3 seconds
+(-2-2) to Monster Level of Area

lines.flavourText:
Some dead have long envied the living.
When given the chance, they take from us what they can.
So we offer our suffrage.
In return, they give only suffering.

lines.name: Olmec's Sanctum

explicitModifiers.text: (40-50)% more Monster Life
(30-40)% increased Monster Damage
Final Boss drops higher Level Items

lines.flavourText:
They flew, and leapt, and clambered over,
They crawled, and swam, and slithered under.
Still its ancient secrets await unclaimed
And of this hidden temple, only legends remain.

lines.flavourText: Here the soil is more deadly than any swing of the axe.\n- Oba of the Karui, Conqueror of Corruption.

lines.name: Maelstrm of Chaos

explicitModifiers.text: Area has patches of chilled ground
Monsters deal 50% extra Damage as Lightning
Monsters are Immune to randomly chosen Elemental Ailments or Stun
Monsters' Melee Attacks apply random Curses on Hit

lines.flavourText:
Whispers from a world apart
Speak my name beyond the tomb;
Bound within the Maelstrm's heart,
Will they grant me strength or doom?

lines.name: Maelstrm of Chaos

explicitModifiers.text: Area has patches of chilled ground
Monsters deal 50% extra Damage as Lightning
Monsters are Immune to randomly chosen Elemental Ailments or Stun
Monsters' Melee Attacks apply random Curses on Hit
Monsters reflect Curses

lines.flavourText:
Whispers from a world apart
Speak my name beyond the tomb;
Bound within the Maelstrm's heart,
Will they grant me strength or doom?

lines.name: Acton's Nightmare

explicitModifiers.text: Area has patches of burning ground
Area is inhabited by Skeletons
Restless Dead
Area is a large Maze
Area contains a Large Chest

lines.flavourText:
Curious, she shook it then,
And tiny screams emerged.
Curiouser, she shook again,
And an eerie silence purred.

lines.name: Acton's Nightmare

explicitModifiers.text: Area has patches of burning ground
Area is inhabited by Skeletons
Restless Dead
Area is a large Maze
Area contains a Large Chest

lines.flavourText:

Curiouser, she shook again,
And an eerie silence purred.

lines.name: Olmec's Sanctum

explicitModifiers.text: (40-50)% more Monster Life
(30-40)% increased Monster Damage
Final Boss drops higher Level Items

lines.flavourText:
They flew, and leapt, and clambered over,
They crawled, and swam, and slithered under.
Still its ancient secrets await unclaimed
And of this hidden temple, only legends remain.

lines.name: Death and Taxes

explicitModifiers.text: Unique Boss deals (30-35)% increased Damage
Unique Boss has (25-30)% increased Attack and Cast Speed
Unique Boss gives 10000% increased Experience

lines.flavourText: So the raiders danced,\nleading their foe ever west,\ntowards certain death.

lines.name: Oba's Cursed Trove

explicitModifiers.text: Area has patches of desecrated ground
(40-50)% more Monster Life
(30-40)% increased Monster Damage
Area becomes fatal after some time

lines.flavourText: Here the soil is more deadly than any swing of the axe.\n- Oba of the Karui, Conqueror of Corruption.

lines.name: Whakawairua Tuahu

explicitModifiers.text: Area contains many Totems
Curses have 50% reduced effect on Monsters
Rare Monsters each have a Nemesis Mod

lines.flavourText: We all began life in darkness, we shall all end it there.

lines.name: Pillars of Arun

explicitModifiers.text: (60-100)% increased Experience gain
Area contains unbridged gaps to cross
Monsters have 50% chance to Avoid Ailments
(20-25)% increased Monster Movement Speed
(20-25)% increased Monster Attack Speed
(20-25)% increased Monster Cast Speed
Players have 200% increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for Movement Skills

lines.flavourText: Man creates where nature cannot.
